subject: Consideration of CPI(IW) either of the preceding month or preceding quarter for the purpose of calculation of price index multiple for appropriate computation of Completion Cost and O&M Payments in HAM Projects- reg.

No. 46724)} Sub: Consideration of CPI(IW) either of the preceding month or preceding quarter for the purpose of calculation of   price index multiple for  appropriate computation of Completion Cost and OGM Payments in HAM Projects- reg: Reference E-file No. 23913, based on the request made by Concessionaire, Maharashtra Division submitted a proposal for suitable direction regarding interpretation of clauses of the Concession Agreement for the project "Four Laning of Yavatmal Wardha (Package-III) section of NH-361 from Km 400.575 to Km 465.500 on HAM in the state of Maharashtra" pertaining to   improper consideration of CPI(IW) for computation of Completion Cost and OGM Payments It has been observed that there prevails a non- uniformity in the aspect among various ROs adopting CPI(IW) either of the preceding month or the preceding quarter. 2_ Accordingly, the matter was discussed in EC vide Agenda Item No_ 557.08 for consideration of CPI(IW)_ The EC deferred the proposal and directed to get views of all FARO through Finance Division and resubmit the proposal: 3_ The matter was up again before EC with views of all FARO vide Agenda Item No. 565.07. EC has approved the proposal that there shall be no change in the provision of the Contract Agreement and accordingly CPI(IW) of preceding quarter shall be taken for the purpose of calculating Price Index Multiple for computation of Completion Cost and O&M Payments in HAM Project. All concerned are requested for the strict compliance. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 0 4/onlvg (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
